markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 4+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Wildwood Ink](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2224)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Primal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=134" />
<trait label="Tattoo" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=262" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 123 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** tattooed on the body

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

These curving, delicate designs resemble leaves, vines, or creepers, most often wrapped around a limb, ear, or throat, or curled around specific muscles. They help you blend in among plants. You gain a +1 item bonus to [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) checks, which increases to +2 in forests.

<document level="2" id="action-1717" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 4"
pfs="Standard"
>
Wildwood Ink
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 123 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 80 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 10"
pfs="Standard"
>
Wildwood Ink (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 123 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 900 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The item bonus to Stealth checks is +2, or +3 in forests. _Tree shape_ lasts up to 1 hour.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 17"
pfs="Standard"
>
Wildwood Ink (Major)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 123 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 15,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The item bonus to Stealth checks is +3, or +4 in forests. _Tree shape_ lasts up to 8 hours.
name: Wildwood Ink (Greater)
